medical_history.chief_complaint: Periumbilical pain migrating to the right lower quadrant (RLQ) with associated vomiting and diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began this morning with periumbilical pain that migrated to the RLQ, worsening throughout the day. Patient vomited several times (non-bloody, non-bilious) and experienced diarrhea once. Denies correlation with her menstrual cycle.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypothyroidism; Past surgical history includes uterine ablation and minor orthopedic surgery.
medical_history.family_history: No history of colon cancer, but several family members with breast and uterine cancer.
